articles.title: Scientists Shocked as Antarctic Glacier Collapses in Record Time - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A sudden, record-breaking glacier collapse in Antarctica is revealing how unseen forces beneath the ice could reshape the planet’s future.
articles.content:
A sudden, record-breaking glacier collapse in Antarctica is revealing how unseen forces beneath the ice could reshape the planet’s future. Credit: Shutterstock
